data.title: Hollywood's top-grossing leading actors ever 2024
data.meta_description: Who is Hollywood's highest grossing actor? As of August 2023, Samuel L. Jackson was Hollywood top-grossing leading actor.
data.text:
All-time top-grossing actors in the U.S. & Canada 2024, by total domestic box revenue

Published by

Highest-grossing leading actors of all time in the United States and Canada as of June 2024, by cumulative domestic box office revenue (in billion U.S. dollars)
